narrative.iWantTo: use the system without any errors

scenario.title: Admin assigns a room to a timetableSlot
scenario.step: When room BO504 and timeslot 1002 are selected
Then room BO504 is assigned to timeslot 1002

scenario.title: Admin assigns a room to a timetableSlot
scenario.step: When room F121 and timeslot 10 are selected
Then room F121 is assigned to timeslot 10
